org.microbean.helm.chart

Class HelmIgnorePathMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microbean.helm.chart.HelmIgnorePathMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PathMatcher, Predicate<Path>

    public class HelmIgnorePathMatcher
extends Object
implements PathMatcher, Predicate<Path>
    A PathMatcher and a Predicate<Path> that matches paths using the syntax of a .helmignore file.

    This class passes all of the unit tests present in the Helm project's package concerned with .helmignore files. It may permit richer syntax, but there are no guarantees made regarding the behavior of this class in such cases.

    Thread Safety

    This class is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    The Helm project's package concerned with {@code .helmignore} files

      • HelmIgnorePathMatcher

        public HelmIgnorePathMatcher(Reader reader)
                      throws IOException
        Creates a new HelmIgnorePathMatcher.
        Parameters:
        reader - a Reader expected to provide access to a logical collection of lines of text, each line of which is a valid .helmignore pattern (or blank line, or comment); may be null; never closed
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error related to the supplied reader is encountered
        PatternSyntaxException - if any of the patterns is invalid

    • Method Detail

      • addPattern

        public final void addPattern(String stringPattern)
        Calls the addPatterns(Collection) method with a singleton Set consisting of the supplied stringPattern.
        Parameters:
        stringPattern - a valid .helmignore pattern; may be null or empty or prefixed with a # character, in which case no action will be taken
        See Also:
        addPatterns(Collection), matches(Path)

      • addPatterns

        public void addPatterns(Collection<? extends String> stringPatterns)
        Adds all of the valid .helmignore patterns present in the supplied Collection of such patterns.

        Overrides must not call addPattern(String).

        Parameters:
        stringPatterns - a Collection of valid .helmignore patterns; may be null in which case no action will be taken
        See Also:
        matches(Path)
